currentWork.summary: Complete website overhaul to fix messaging confusion. Users were thinking CodeBakers was an app builder (like Lovable/Replit) instead of a prompt enhancer for their IDE. Now the value prop is clear: 'Your prompts suck. We fix them.'
completedThisSession: Rewrote hero: 'Your prompts suck. We fix them.' with IDE visual
Added 'How It Works' 3-step visual showing IDE workflow
Redesigned Interactive Demo as 'Prompt Optimizer Demo'
Added callout: 'CodeBakers is NOT an app builder'
Replaced 'The Problem' section with 'Two Problems, One Solution'
Updated all CTAs from 'Start Building' to 'Upgrade My Prompts'
Added IDE-style input with mac window chrome in demo
Updated final CTA copy for prompt enhancement focus
currentWork.notes: Key messaging now emphasizes: (1) CodeBakers works INSIDE Cursor/Claude Code, (2) It's a prompt enhancer not an app builder, (3) Two problems: bad prompts + long prompts = we solve both.
